title: A Cognoscenti contributor on what her grandmother taught her about work and generational wealth
dc:creator: WBUR
description: We hear from Kellie Carter Jackson, an associate professor of Africana studies at Wellesley College. Three years ago, she wrote about her grandmother Ethel Phillips and her life as a domestic worker.
